caption.title: Accuracy predicting gross epidemic activity.
caption.p: Four measures, sensitivity (i.e., true positive rate, TPR), specificity (i.e., true negative rate, SPC), precision (i.e., positive predictive value, PPV), and negative predictive value (NPV) are shown for (A) the SIR-EAKF and (B) the SIR-PF forecast system. Results are tallied over forecast of H1N1 (orange), H3N2 (red), Type B (green), all strains combined time series (blue), and all forecasts (white).
